MediMinder

Managing medication shouldn't be a struggle. MediMinder empowers users to stay consistent with their health routines through smart, timely support—helping build better habits and improve overall wellness.

Get Started Learn More

About the Device

MediMinder is an IoT device designed to help maintenance medication users stay on track with their prescribed regimens. By integrating real-time reminders, adherence tracking, and medication storage, MediMinder aims to improve health outcomes through habit formation and behavioral change.

Meet the faces behind MediMinder →

Why Choose MediMinder?

MediMinder is designed with resilience, ensuring that patients can rely on a durable and effective solution for managing their medication schedules. Our commitment to innovativeness drives us to develop a smart, user-friendly device that enhances medication adherence through technology. Rooted in social responsibility, we aim to address the real challenges faced by individuals with chronic conditions, providing them with a practical tool to improve their health. Upholding excellence, we strive to create a high-quality, reliable device that meets the needs of patients, healthcare providers, and future medical advancements.

Key Features

Smart
Reminders

Visual, sound, and vibration alerts to ensure timely medication intake.

Adherence
Monitoring

Tracks and records medication-taking behavior using an infrared detection system.

Medication
Storage

Organized compartments for secure and easy access to prescribed drugs.

User-Friendly Interface

Simple controls and an intuitive LED guidance system.

Cloud-Based Data Tracking

Syncs adherence records with an online platform for easy monitoring by users and caregivers.

Steps How To Use

  1. Set Up & Register: Visit the MediMinder website, log in and customize your medication schedule and user profile.
  2. Load & Sync: Place your medications in the designated compartments, then turn on the device to sync with your schedule.
  3. Receive Alerts & Take Medications: When reminded, take your medication as instructed. The device will automatically track your adherence, and will not stop reminding until you’ve taken your medication.
  4. Monitor Progress: Log in to the website anytime to check your adherence history and receive recommendations. Relatives/caregivers or even doctors may be given with the code to assist in monitoring your adherence.

Start Tracking Today!
